text: ' Will & Grace,'which returns to NBC later this year, gave TV its first gay title character ( Eric McCormack ). ( Photo : George Lange, NBC ) BEVERLY HILLS — Will & Grace & Karen & Jack are back, and NBC has them. After an eight - year run and an 11 - year absence, the groundbreaking hit sitcom returns to NBC for a 16 - episode run on Sept. 28, and a second, 13 - episode season announced at the Television Critics Association Thursday. And it returns with its original stars — Eric McCormack, Debra Messing, Megan Mullally and Sean Hayes — and creators Max Mutchnick and David Kohan. If you saw the original series finale, you may remember that it ended with Will and Grace happily partnered
